trans-unit.source: External user token format for Azure Active Directory B2B collaboration preview | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: External user token format for Azure Active Directory B2B collaboration preview | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory B2B supports your cross-company relationships by enabling business partners to selectively access your corporate applications
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory B2B supports your cross-company relationships by enabling business partners to selectively access your corporate applications

trans-unit.source: External user token format for Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) B2B collaboration preview
trans-unit.target: External user token format for Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) B2B collaboration preview

trans-unit.source: The claims for a standard Azure AD token are described in the [Supported Token and Claim Types](active-directory-token-and-claims.md) article on azure.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: The claims for a standard Azure AD token are described in the [Supported Token and Claim Types](active-directory-token-and-claims.md) article on azure.microsoft.com.

trans-unit.source: The claims that are different for an authenticated B2B collaboration external user are as follows:
trans-unit.target: The claims that are different for an authenticated B2B collaboration external user are as follows:

trans-unit.source: **OID:** the object ID from the resource tenant
trans-unit.target: **OID:** the object ID from the resource tenant

trans-unit.source: **TID**: tenant ID from the resource tenant
trans-unit.target: **TID**: tenant ID from the resource tenant

trans-unit.source: **IDP**: this is the home tenant of the user
trans-unit.target: **IDP**: this is the home tenant of the user

trans-unit.source: **AltSecId**: this is the alternative security ID, which is opaque to you
trans-unit.target: **AltSecId**: this is the alternative security ID, which is opaque to you

trans-unit.source: Browse our other articles on Azure B2B collaboration:
trans-unit.target: Browse our other articles on Azure B2B collaboration:

trans-unit.source: What is Azure AD B2B collaboration?
trans-unit.target: What is Azure AD B2B collaboration?
